"Blog"

Yeah just kidding. I feel like the brand of blog I could offer here is a bit overdone at the moment; maybe when I decide I want to ramble on something unique enough I’ll turn this into a blog, but for now, instead here have some recommendations of things to do instead of reading my "blog":

Give me a movie: After Yang is a very good recent take on AI, maybe tries to be a bit more meaningful than it actually is but still worth the watch.

Give me a book: The Three-Body Problem and its sequels (especially the second book) finally got me into sci-fi. Also read this for some interesting ideas on longtermism.

I came here for a blog so give me a blog: This blog might not be everyone's kind of thing but it's written too well to not recommend.

Give me a game: Watch the trailer for Outer Wilds and if it looks cool just play it without Googling anything else because it's really difficult to talk about without spoiling it.

Give me a rabbit-hole I can go down and waste the rest of my day on: Literally every Channel 5 video is a wild ride.
